net.sf.mmm.client.ui.base.widget

Class AbstractUiWidget.EventSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.client.ui.base.widget.AbstractUiWidget.EventSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeReadFocused, UiFeature, UiFeatureEvent, UiHandlerEvent, UiHandler
    Enclosing class:
    AbstractUiWidget<VALUE>

    protected class AbstractUiWidget.EventSender
extends Object
implements UiHandlerEvent, UiFeatureEvent, AttributeReadFocused
    This inner class is an adapter for the events.

    • Method Detail

      • isFocused

        public boolean isFocused()
        This method determines if this object currently has the focus. In this case the cursor is placed in the object (e.g. a text input) and it will receive keyboard events.
        Specified by:
        isFocused in interface AttributeReadFocused
        Returns:
        true if this object is focused, false otherwise.

      • addEventHandler

        public void addEventHandler(UiHandlerEvent handler)
        This method adds the given UiHandlerEvent to this object.
        Specified by:
        addEventHandler in interface UiFeatureEvent
        Parameters:
        handler - is the UiHandlerEvent to add.

      • removeEventHandler

        public boolean removeEventHandler(UiHandlerEvent handler)
        This method removes the given UiHandlerEvent from this object.
        Specified by:
        removeEventHandler in interface UiFeatureEvent
        Parameters:
        handler - is the UiHandlerEvent to remove.
        Returns:
        true if the handler has been removed successfully, false if it was NOT registered and nothing has changed.

      • onEvent

        public void onEvent(UiEvent event)
        This method is invoked for each UiEvent (of any type) fired by the widget.
        Specified by:
        onEvent in interface UiHandlerEvent
        Parameters:
        event - is the UiEvent that has been sent.

        Returns:
